Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with symbol of wreath with ribbons.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '37̣8̣'. Name Bromios. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, BIBALEX 0325.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (102)
